dynamic_on.description: turn the dynamic analysis on (true) or off (false)

dynamic_truncated.description: truncate the dynamic analysis to the first t timesteps

dynamic_timesteps.description: the t timesteps to which the the dynamic analysis is truncated

input_location.description: locations (node numbers) corresponding to ground motion input, separated by comma, no space. 0 for multiple support excitation.

damping_modes.description: modes for which to specify damping ratios, separated by comma, no space

damping_ratios.description: damping ratios for selected modes, separated by comma, no space

rayleigh_zerolength_on.description: turn rayleigh damping on for zerolength elements (abutment, hinge, and column pin springs)

dynamic_scale_factor.description: scale factor applied to input ground motion

record_zip.description: path to zip file containing the recorded motions for ground motion input and sensor comparison
